sentences.en: By definition, a fifth wheel is a wheel or a portion of a wheel with two parts rotating on each other that sits on the front axle of a carriage and adds extra support so it doesn’t tip.
sentences.cn: 通过定义，第五个轮子，是成为一个四轮马车的前车轴上互相旋转的两个部分的一个轮子或一个轮子的一部分，而加上一个额外的辅助轮子，这样它就不会倾斜。

sentences.en: Frank abandoned his axle as the heat in it died.
sentences.cn: 由于车轴已经凉了,弗兰克扔下了它.

sentences.en: In combination with the sophisticated axle geometry, this ensures agile driving behavior.
sentences.cn: 在与先进的轴几何组合, 是为了确保敏捷的驾驶行为.

sentences.en: Remove the lower suspension arm nut and bolt from the axle bracket.
sentences.cn: 从车轴支架上拆去下端悬吊臂螺帽和螺栓.

sentences.en: Remove the upper suspension arm nut and bolt at the axle bracket.
sentences.cn: 从车轴支架上拆去上端悬吊臂螺帽和螺栓。

sentences.en: RUGGEDNESS. Automotive ring gear differential. Axle shafts on roller bearings.
sentences.cn: 强度: 自动差速齿轮,滚子轴承上的刚性车轴.

sentences.en: The article introduces a new type of axle lockpin hole machining tool.
sentences.cn: 文章介绍了一种新型的前桥锁销孔加工的工艺方法.

sentences.en: The axle doesn't work smoothly. It needs oiling.
sentences.cn: 轮轴发涩, 该上油了.

sentences.en: the front/rear axle
sentences.cn: 前 / 后车轴

sentences.en: The garage mechanic found a crack in the back axle of the car.
sentences.cn: 汽车修理厂的机修工发现汽车的后车轴上有一条裂缝.

sentences.en: The mechanic greased the car's axle.
sentences.cn: 机械工给汽车轴上了润滑油.

sentences.en: The method of vehicle peccancy surveillance is usually achieved through inductor buried in the ground or axle sensor.
sentences.cn: 传统的对交通违章车辆监控是通过埋在地下的感应器或车轴感测器实现的。

sentences.en: The rear axle carries the greatest weight.
sentences.cn: 后轴负荷最重的分量.

sentences.en: The taxi driver set the wheel on the axle.
sentences.cn: 出租车丝机把轮子装在轴上.

sentences.en: The wheel and axle is really a sort of lever.
sentences.cn: 轮轴实际上是一种杠杆.

sentences.en: They know how to code, but they're also familiar with the smell of axle grease.
sentences.cn: 他们知道如何写代码，但是他们也非常熟悉车轴机油的气味。

sentences.en: They weld the pieces of a broken axle.
sentences.cn: 他们焊接断了的车轴.

sentences.en: Thus a wheel revolves on its axle.
sentences.cn: 于是,轮子在轴上旋转.

sentences.en: to weld a broken axle
sentences.cn: 焊接一条断裂的轴

sentences.en: Wheel rotation allows easy alignment on axle with brake keys.
sentences.cn: 车轮旋转,方便系统对准轴与刹车键.

trans.tran_en: the bar connecting two wheels on a car or other vehicle
